author: wn.com
title: Clark geographers’ new study projects melting of Antarctic ice shelves will intensify (Clark University)
text: ( Source : Clark University ) Luke Trusel, postdoctoral scholar at Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution , stands near sea ice covered in melt ponds at McMurdo Station in Antarctica , in 2010 . Trusel received a Ph.D. in geography at Clark
